noToken: No invitation link provided. Please use the link from your email.
networkError: Could not verify the link. Check your connection and try again.
invalidLink: Link is invalid. Check the link or request a new invitation.
invalidOrAlreadyUsed: Invitation link is invalid or has already been used. You can sign in.
expired: Invitation has expired. Contact your administrator for a new invitation.
cancelled: Invitation was cancelled. Contact your administrator.
alreadyAccepted: This invitation was already used. You can sign in.
tokenRegenerated: A new email with a new link was sent to {{email}}. Check your inbox (and spam folder) and use the new link.
tokenRegeneratedNoEmail: A new invitation email has been sent. Check your inbox (and spam folder) and use the new link.
emailSentAgainLead: The link you used has expired. We have sent a new invitation email.
title: Accept invitation
passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
success: Account activated. You can now sign in.
errorUseFreshLink: Use the link from your email or request a new invitation.
errorAlreadyActivated: You have already activated your account — please sign in.
errorCannotAccept: This invitation can no longer be accepted.
